categories: Category:Sith of the New Sith Wars

nodes.text: Lahzar was a male king and former Jedi who fell to the dark side of the Force and allied with the Sith near the end of the New Sith Wars. Three hundred Jedi Knights under Lord Valenthyne Farfalla defeated him in the Tholatin system on their way to Ruusan. Farfalla considered Lahzar to be treacherous.
